name: Dreams of Being
description:
Created in cooperation with Hyper_Tophat I awake in a void of chaos.
In front of me is a book on a rock.
On the rock is a sigil.

I step forward.

Dreams of Being is an exploration through some scenes from my dream journal. My keeping of a dream journal was inspired by games such as Yume Nikki, LSD: Dream Emulator, and #21: The World, so I guess you could say that the game was too.

Wander around the set of worlds before you and if you're feeling adventurous, try to find all of the sigils. In 0.5 you may find yourself roaming with other entities.

ALSO! This game uses files on your computer (such as images) as assets displayed in-game. They are in NO WAY shared over the network, they are used purely as a client-side display.

Controls

Open Book - Q Move - WASD Interact - E or Left Click Pause - Escape

IF YOU'RE UPDATING, PLEASE READ

Every once and a while when I update the game, I need to alter how the save file is stored. If you have a save from an older version, and the new version gets stuck when you try to load it, please start a new game!
